title: Sait Nagjee Football Tournament
text:
The Sait Nagjee All India Football Tournament is one of the most prestigious <a href="Association%20football">football</a> Tournaments held in <a href="Kozhikode">Kozhikode</a>, <a href="Kerala">Kerala</a>, <a href="India">India</a>. The tournament was very popular from the beginning & attracted large crowd since 1952. The tournament played until 1995 regularly though with stoppages a couple of times. In 1995, the tournament was won by <a href="JCT%20F.C.">JCT Mills</a>. Since 1995, there was a gap of 21 years during which the tournament was not held. Due to various reasons including the predominance gained by cricket, lack of support from the government and the escalation of real estate costs made football less popular.
The tournament was revived again in <a href="2016%20Sait%20Nagjee%20Trophy">2016</a> with clubs from different parts of the world and Argentina U-23 national team. Brazilian footballer <a href="Ronaldinho">Ronaldinho</a> is the brand ambassador for the tournament. <a href="FC%20Dnipro%20Dnipropetrovsk">FC Dnipro Reserves</a> won the trophy beating <a href="Clube%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Paranaense%23Youth%20team">Atlético Paranaense Reserves</a> in the final.
Stadium.
All the matches of the tournament are being played in the <a href="EMS%20Stadium">EMS Stadium</a> which was located in the heart of the <a href="Calicut">Calicut</a> city. The West stand was the largest and could accommodate the maximum 1,00,000 of people.1,00,000 people watch on stadium
